title: Slough
summary: Slough (/slaʊ/) is a large town in Berkshire, England (within the historic county of Buckinghamshire[2]), 20 miles (32 km) west of central London (Charing Cross) and 19 miles (31 km) north-east of Reading. It is in the Thames Valley and within the London metropolitan area at the intersection of the M4, M40 and M25 motorways. Slough had a population of 164,000 in 2018.
